item.title: PD: Aboriginal & Torres Strait Islander Mental Health First Aid
item.description: Tags: #firstnations #aboriginal #torresstrait Code: C Type: Blended or in-person Website: Mental Health First Aid Description: The 14-hour Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Mental Health First Aid course is for any interested adult.

item.title: PD: Cultural Responsiveness Training
item.description: Tags: #firstnations Code: C Type: Self-paced online and blended Website: IAHA Description: A cultural safety training that uses IAHA's evidence-based Cultural Responsiveness Framework.

item.title: PD: Differences between Aboriginal and standard Australian English narrative patterns
item.description: Tags: #firstnations #language Code: C, O Type: Self-paced online (90 minutes) Cost: $199 Website: SPA Learning Hub Description: Learning objectives include identifying the levels of language and becoming aware of likely areas of miscommunication with speakers of Aboriginal languages and Aboriginal English, discussing the significance of language–driven narrative patterns for practice, articulating key differences between Standard Australian English and Aboriginal narrative, developing strategies for identifying and minimising miscommunication and negative client outcomes associated with narrative differences.

item.title: PD: TribalLink Cultural Training
item.description: Tags: #firstnations Code: C Type: Online (Cultural Training) or face-to-face (Cultural Awareness for Health Professionals) Website: TribalLink Description: Online Cultural Training

item.title: PD: Youth Aboriginal & Torres Strait Islander Mental Health First Aid
item.description: Tags: #firstnations #aboriginal #torresstrait Code: C Type: Blended or in-person Website: Mental Health First Aid Description: The Youth Aboriginal & Torres Strait Islander Mental Health First Aid course is for any interested adults, 18 years and over.
